summary:
Just a savegame of a female darkelf I play. It\'s mainly intended as a face resource and doesn\'t start you of at level 1.

1.5 UPDATE 

I discovered a mod that allows human features for the dark elves and did an updated version. This new version requires - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11394 

Also in the updated screensh
descriptionHtml:
To get her to appear as in the screenshots you will have to use these mods;

Ran\'s headmesh (D)
Univision pack (The eyetexture is one of the human ones, I simply renamed it)
ApachiiSkyhair

- these are the 3 primary ones but I also used makeup tintmasks from the offical facetextures for Calientes bodymod. From the same mod I also replaced the specular map for the face to make the lips less shiny. The lip tintmask came from Pretty lips by Danariel. 

None of these little added tweaks are needed though, you can simply use the Ran head and unvision for a very similar result. :) 

Enjoy! 

All mods can be found right here on the nexus, just make a search. 


1.5 UPDATE 

I discovered a mod that allows human features for the dark elves and did an updated version. This new version requires - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11394 

Also in the updated screenshot I changed the specular map to the one in Tktk1\'s Pretty Face pack.
author: TL
